channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Jazz Reporting Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Jazz Reporting Service

item.title: CVE-2019-4184|2024-08-04T19:33:37.572Z -- ibm -- jazz%20reporting%20service
item.description: IBM Jazz Reporting Service 6.0 through 6.0.6.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 158974.

item.title: CVE-2019-4494|2024-08-04T19:40:47.355Z -- ibm -- jazz%20reporting%20service
item.description: IBM Jazz Reporting Service (JRS) 6.0, 6.0.1, 6.0.2, 6.0.3, 6.0.4, 6.0.5, 6.0.6, and 6.0.6.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 164115.

item.title: CVE-2020-4933|2024-08-04T08:14:59.273Z -- ibm -- jazz%20reporting%20service
item.description: IBM Jazz Reporting Service 6.0.6.1, 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. item.title: CVE-2019-4047|2024-08-04T19:26:27.910Z -- ibm -- jazz%20reporting%20service
item.description: IBM Jazz Reporting Service (JRS) 6.0.6 could allow an authenticated user to access the execution log files as a guest user, and obtain the information of the server execution. IBM X-Force ID: 156243.

item.description: IBM Jazz Reporting Service 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, 7.0, and 7.0.1 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. item.title: CVE-2024-25052|2024-06-13T13:45:31.989Z -- ibm -- jazz%20reporting%20service
item.description: IBM Jazz Reporting Service 7.0.3 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by an admin user. IBM X-Force ID: 283363.
